participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

reshist_addr1_mustaccess.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if legislation requiring Prescribers to access PDMP before prescribing as interpreted by PDAPS was effective at date of baseline visit (address 1)

reshist_addr1_AnyPDMP.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if PDMP enabling legislation for any type of PDMP in effect (including paper-based systems was first enacted at date of baseline visit (address 1)

reshist_addr1_Op_PDMP.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if a “modern PDMP system” became operational and users could access was enabled at date of baseline visit (address 1)

reshist_addr2_mustaccess.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if legislation requiring Prescribers to access PDMP before prescribing as interpreted by PDAPS was effective at date of baseline visit (address 2)

reshist_addr2_AnyPDMP.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if PDMP enabling legislation for any type of PDMP in effect (including paper-based systems was first enacted at date of baseline visit (address 2)

reshist_addr2_Op_PDMP.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if a “modern PDMP system” became operational and users could access was enabled at date of baseline visit (address 2)

reshist_addr3_mustaccess.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if legislation requiring Prescribers to access PDMP before prescribing as interpreted by PDAPS was effective at date of baseline visit (address 3)

reshist_addr3_AnyPDMP.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if PDMP enabling legislation for any type of PDMP in effect (including paper-based systems was first enacted at date of baseline visit (address 3)

reshist_addr3_Op_PDMP.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if a “modern PDMP system” became operational and users could access was enabled at date of baseline visit (address 3)
